commands.description: remove the process type from your app
commands.help:
Usage: heroku container:rm [flags]

remove the process type from your app

Flags:
 -a, --app APP        app to run command against
 -r, --remote REMOTE  git remote of app to use

Usage:
    heroku container:rm web        # Destroys the web container
    heroku container:rm web worker # Destroys the web and worker containers
helpLine: remove the process type from your app

commands.description: Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps
commands.help:
Usage: heroku container

Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps
helpLine: Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps

commands.description: log in to Heroku Container Registry
commands.help:
Usage: heroku container:login [flags]

log in to Heroku Container Registry

Flags:
 -v, --verbose

Usage:
        heroku container:login
helpLine: log in to Heroku Container Registry

commands.description: log out from Heroku Container Registry
commands.help:
Usage: heroku container:logout [flags]

log out from Heroku Container Registry

Flags:
 -v, --verbose
helpLine: log out from Heroku Container Registry

commands.description: builds, then pushes Docker images to deploy your Heroku app
commands.help:
Usage: heroku container:push [flags]

builds, then pushes Docker images to deploy your Heroku app

Flags:
 -R, --recursive      pushes Dockerfile.<process> found in current and
                      subdirectories
 -a, --app APP        app to run command against
 -r, --remote REMOTE  git remote of app to use
 -v, --verbose
 --arg ARG            set build-time variables

Usage:
    heroku container:push web                          # Pushes Dockerfile to web process type
    heroku container:push worker                       # Pushes Dockerfile to worker process type
    heroku container:push web worker --recursive       # Pushes Dockerfile.web and Dockerfile.worker
    heroku container:push --recursive                  # Pushes Dockerfile.*
    heroku container:push web --arg ENV=live,HTTPS=on  # Build-time variables
helpLine: builds, then pushes Docker images to deploy your Heroku app

commands.description: builds, then runs the docker image locally
commands.help:
Usage: heroku container:run [flags]

builds, then runs the docker image locally

Flags:
 -a, --app APP        app to run command against
 -p, --port PORT      port the app will run on
 -r, --remote REMOTE  git remote of app to use
 -v, --verbose

Usage:
    heroku container:run web bash # Runs bash on the local web docker container
    heroku container:run worker   # Runs the container CMD on the local worker container
helpLine: builds, then runs the docker image locally

topics.description: Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps
topics.name: container
topics.help: Use containers to build and deploy Heroku apps
